job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a junior developer with experience in an object oriented programming language, who is interested in utilizing (and/or learning) Java and Python to deliver services & libraries that add value to our Search as a Service platform. You will be part of a mature, cross-functional team that is responsible for the end-to-end delivery of these services, which includes design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components.

   The project is focused on the delivery of services within the search domain with a service architecture that utilizes Solr, query parsing, dictionaries, cloud platforms, and 3rd party technologies in its delivery. Joining the team would offer the opportunity to learn about technologies in the content domain, use AWS services, and learn from a mature development team. As a member of an agile team, we are looking for motivated and vocal individuals to collaborate and help build the best practices for the development team, and if lacking knowledge in one of the languages, we can provide training/resources to help learn either Java or Python.

   Joining the team would offer the opportunity to learn about the latest technologies in the domain of search technology, utilize & learn AWS technologies, and participate in a collaborative, flat team structure.

   You will report into the lead software engineer and work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers. Your role is crucial to the continued growth and evolution of one of the leading companies providing expert solutions to the healthcare, compliance, legal and tax markets globally.

   Tasks and responsibilities

   * Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications in collaboration with onshore and offshore developers, mostly for the development of PoC's.

   * Identify potential opportunities for code optimization.

   * Provide input for code reviews and help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices.

   * Maintain code sanity and promote & practise coding standards/practices within the team.

   * Document application design and logic

   * Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application.

   * Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK

   * Collaborate with team members and QA engineers to drive deeper integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies to enhance uptake & delivery of components.

   * Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog with the project lead.

   * Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies that can affect how we approach our solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Product Software Engineer

We are looking for a junior developer with experience in an object oriented programming language, who is interested in utilizing (and/or learning) Java and Python to deliver services & libraries that add value to our Search as a Service platform. You will be part of a mature, cross-functional team that is responsible for the end-to-end delivery of these services, which includes design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components.

   The project is focused on the delivery of services within the search domain with a service architecture that utilizes Solr, query parsing, dictionaries, cloud platforms, and 3rd party technologies in its delivery. Joining the team would offer the opportunity to learn about technologies in the content domain, use AWS services, and learn from a mature development team. As a member of an agile team, we are looking for motivated and vocal individuals to collaborate and help build the best practices for the development team, and if lacking knowledge in one of the languages, we can provide training/resources to help learn either Java or Python.

   Joining the team would offer the opportunity to learn about the latest technologies in the domain of search technology, utilize & learn AWS technologies, and participate in a collaborative, flat team structure.

   You will report into the lead software engineer and work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers. Your role is crucial to the continued growth and evolution of one of the leading companies providing expert solutions to the healthcare, compliance, legal and tax markets globally.

   Tasks and responsibilities

   * Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications in collaboration with onshore and offshore developers, mostly for the development of PoC's.

   * Identify potential opportunities for code optimization.

   * Provide input for code reviews and help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices.

   * Maintain code sanity and promote & practise coding standards/practices within the team.

   * Document application design and logic

   * Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application.

   * Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK

   * Collaborate with team members and QA engineers to drive deeper integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies to enhance uptake & delivery of components.

   * Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog with the project lead.

   * Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies that can affect how we approach our solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional software engineering tasks within a search domain, mentioning Java and Python. While it touches upon NLP, machine learning, and AI technologies, it does not indicate a primary focus on developing or fine-tuning generative models, building RAG systems, or advanced prompt engineering. The core responsibilities revolve around service-oriented application development, testing, deployment, and optimization within a search platform, which aligns more with a general software engineering role rather than a specialized GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves writing, testing, reviewing, and documenting service-oriented applications, developing PoC's, identifying code optimization opportunities, providing input for code reviews, maintaining code sanity, promoting coding standards, documenting application design, and contributing to architecture, assets, and tools. These are all core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components', which are all fundamental aspects of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components

job_tasks.justification: The responsibilities include 'help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices' and 'Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application', which fall under operations and maintenance of deployed systems.
job_tasks.phrase: help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices

job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on operational improvements for reliability and efficiency, which is a key aspect of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application

job_tasks.justification: The role requires working 'hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers' and evaluating 'technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog', indicating a need to understand business needs and align technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions collaborating to 'drive deeper integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies', which implies involvement in the modeling aspect, even if not the primary focus.
job_tasks.phrase: integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies

job_tasks.justification: The project utilizes 'Solr, query parsing, dictionaries, cloud platforms, and 3rd party technologies in its delivery', and mentions delivering 'services & libraries that add value to our Search as a Service platform'. This suggests data handling and processing within a search context.
job_tasks.phrase: Solr, query parsing, dictionaries, cloud platforms

job_tasks.justification: The task of 'Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs' is a software development responsibility related to system design and planning.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools
